data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, sababii ani jireenya hir始ina
jaalalli kee kan hin geeddaramne sun ija koo dura jiraatii;
Ani warra nama gowwoomsan wajjin hin taa始u,
ani waldaa warra hammina hojjetanii nan jibba;
Yaa Waaqayyo, ani harka koo qulqullummaadhaan nan dhiqadha;
Yaa Waaqayyo, mana ati keessa jiraattu,
Lubbuu koo cubbamoota wajjin, jireenya koos
warra harka isaanii keessa karoorri jal始inaa jiru
Ani garuu jireenya hir始ina hin qabne nan jiraadha;
Miilli koo lafa wal qixxee irra dhaabata;
